Class Commands

java.lang.Object
Commands
public class Commands extends Object
Class to issue commands that interact with the pet

This class is responsible for using commands that can interact with the pet. The user is able to feed the pet, make the pet sleep, provide a gift, etc.

    • feedPet

      public void feedPet(String foodType)
      b) Feed: Increases pet's fullness using the food item from pet.inv.
      Parameters:
      foodType - the food item that the pet will consume

    • givePetPresent

      public void givePetPresent(String giftType)
      c) Give Gift: Increases the pet's happiness using a gift item from pet.inv.
      Parameters:
      giftType - the gift type that the pet will receive

    • visitVet

      public void visitVet(String medicineType)
      d) Take to the Vet: Increases pet's health.
      Parameters:
      medicineType - the type of medicine that the pet will receive while it is at the vet

    • playWithPet

      public void playWithPet()
      e) Play: Increases pet's happiness.

    • exercisepet

      public void exercisepet()
      f) Exercise: Lowers pet's hunger/sleep while increasing health.

    • makePetSpeak

      public void makePetSpeak()
